title: S3cco
author: S3cco
content: Coinfest Asia | 25-26 August 2022 | Bali, IndonesiaEvent Website: https://coinfest.asia/Coinfest Asia is an industry event focused on the future of cryptocurrency and web3 in Asia.Coinfest Asia will showcase solutions, innovations and applications from around the world in the home of 270 million people, Indonesia. Gathering thought leaders and innovators in the space, exhibitors, executives and 1000+ attendees over the span of 2 days.

comments.author: cheezcarls
comments.body: Quote from: S3cco on May 24, 2022, 03:18:47 PMCoinfest Asia | 25-26 August 2022 | Bali, IndonesiaEvent Website: https://coinfest.asia/Coinfest Asia is an industry event focused on the future of cryptocurrency and web3 in Asia.Coinfest Asia will showcase solutions, innovations and applications from around the world in the home of 270 million people, Indonesia. Gathering thought leaders and innovators in the space, exhibitors, executives and 1000+ attendees over the span of 2 days.Hopefully the standard package will be at least free for us to access. Or if worst case scenario that if it’s a cheap price that I can afford, I won’t hesitate to book a ticket there just to attend the event in Bali, Indonesia. After attending the NFT Metaverse GameFi 2022 event in Okada Manila, I am looking to attend more physical crypto-related conferences, summits, etc.

comments.author: S3cco
comments.body: You can use promo code BITCOINGARDEN35 to obtain a 35% discount on tickets. Limited to 15 users and only valid till the 31st of July 2022.
